original_text: After she had done that, she said, ‘Now I will get some water for your camels too. I will do this until they have drunk as much water as they want.’
korean_text: 마시게 하기를 다하고 이르되 당신의 낙타를 위하여서도 물을 길어 그것들도 배불리 마시게 하리이다 하고

sentences.original_text: Now I will get some water for your camels too
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 나도 당신의 낙타들을 위해 물을 가져오겠습니다

sentences.original_text: until they have drunk as much water as they want
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 원하는 만큼 물을 마실 때까지
